channel.title: A question regarding attacking NPC's
channel.description:
Well i downloaded PhoneScape's source, the problem is:
Players can attack NPC's with magic, and this makes the NPC's chase after them and deal damage. Hence, results in NPC's not staying in their correct location.
Can anybody please supply me with code to add that stops players being able to attack NPC's. If it is really necessary, i will give RS2 gold after you have taught me.
Add my MSN: x.kezzer.x@gmail.com Thanks, Have a nice day.

item.title: A question regarding attacking NPC's
item.dc:creator: @k3zzer k3zzer
item.description:
@k3zzer wrote:

No i mean the NPC’s that for example sell items. My NPC’s who sell items in Varrock Dummys, get attacked by players and they completely walk out of the area.

Is their a code to make them all stand still?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 17, 2006, 02:07:05 PM[/size][hr]Bump, will probably pay around 500k![br][size=1]Posted at: December 17, 2006, 09:45:33 PM[/size][hr]BUMP

Read full topic

item.title: A question regarding attacking NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

Wow. There is none. That would be retarted to remove attacking NPC’s. Just leave it how it is. Or make a range for them to walk so they can’t go out of that range.

Read full topic
